metadata.title: CVE-2018-8043 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The unimac_mdio_probe function in drivers/net/phy/mdio-bcm-unimac.c in theLinux kernel through 4.15.8 does not validate certain resourceavailability, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8043` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-13-generic - 4.15.0-13.14
linux-image-4.15.0-13-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-13.14
linux-image-4.15.0-13-lowlatency - 4.15.0-13.14
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-13-generic - 4.15.0-13.14
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1006-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1006.7
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1003-aws - 4.15.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1003-azure - 4.15.0-1003.3

No subscription required
